segments.text: Fastback Travel . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you put me through to Dan Aykroyd ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's on holiday for the week , I'm afraid . Can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you leave him a message ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell him that Horst Weissmuller phoned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . It's H , O , R , S , T , then W , E , I , S , S , M , U umlaut , L , L , E , R .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , I think I've got that . OK , what's the message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just tell him I'll call him when I get back from Australia . That's it .
segments.speaker: S2
